company_commercial_names: desserter utan gränser | desserter utan granser
short_description: desserter utan gränser is a bakery based in sweden.
long_description: desserter utan gränser (desserts without limits) is all about experiencing sweet taste sensations. we produce desserts, pastries and confectionery using our own recipes in our production kitchen, which is located in gotenburg. with our desserts, we strive to create both balance and contrast. swedish flavours are combined with influences from various other parts of the world. just as in one's imagination, there are no limits to our creativity. at our liquorice and dessert tastings we share this philosophy and our knowledge with others. the aim with these events is to inspire you to be creative at home in the kitchen. salmiakkola is our main product. it is a handmade soft caramel containing real liquorice, and has been named sweden's favourite liquorice for three years in a row. we have manufactured salmiakkola since the company was founded in 2010, and it is sold here in the online shop, in selected delicatessens throughout sweden, as well as in finland and germany.
generated_description: desserter utan gränser is a company based in stockholms kommun, stockholm county, specializing in handmade swedish confectionery. founded in 2010, the company is renowned for its salmiakkola, a handmade soft caramel containing real liquorice. desserter utan gränser produces a variety of desserts, pastries, and confectionery using their own recipes in their production kitchen located in gotenburg. the company combines traditional swedish flavors with influences from various global cuisines, aiming to create both balance and contrast in their products. their offerings include salmiakkola sauce, julkola (christmas soft caramel), and other unique sweets and desserts.
